summary: Construction professional specializing in repair and maintenance of residential units, plumbing, roofing, painting, and related trades; experienced in inventory control and staff training.

experience.title: Maintenance/Repair Technician
experience.description: Repair of A/C units; repair and replacement of water heaters, stoves, and refrigerators. Change out faulty valves and faucets. Unclog drains, toilets, snake clean-outs. Change out windows and locks. Make repairs to sheetrock; roof repairs and painting inside and outside. Controls inventory, creates orders with vendors. Trained, coached and mentored staff to ensure smooth adoption of new rules.

experience.title: Maintenance Technician
experience.description: Maintained 320 units in Jasmine Terrace complex; repairs to AC window units. Repair and replace water heaters, stoves and refrigerators. Change out faulty valves and faucets; unclog drains, toilets, snake clean outs. Change out windows and locks. Repaired sheetrock; roof repairs and painting inside and out. Controls inventory, creates orders with vendors. Trained, coached and mentored staff.

experience.title: General Apprentice / Construction
experience.description: Plumbing, roofing, sheetrock, painting. Replace water heaters. General apprentice and construction.

experience.title: Painter
experience.description: Paint and repair the outside of problems in a timely matter. Pressure washed houses and made repairs to old / damaged frames.
